articles.title: Readers: Should foster parents’ personal views affect their ability to foster?
articles.description:
A new Massachusetts rule requires foster parents to affirm a child’s sexual orientation and gender identity — and it’s drawing scrutiny from the Trump administration.

The post Readers: Should foster parents’ personal views affect their ability to foster? appeared first on Boston.com.
